descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 15 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
Dare you take on the Impossible Stack? In BLOKZ you’ll DEFLECT balls back into play in a sci-fi fusion of Squash, Padel, Tennis, and retro Breakout puzzles! Every rally is a test of speed, precision, and reactions — just like the world’s fastest racket sports. Feel the thrill of pure Padel-style shot making as you angle, block, and smash your way through waves of BLOKZ.

Clear each stage in the fastest time possible to rise up the leaderboards and be crowned BLOKZ Champion. With 45 handcrafted levels, you’ll progress from casual play to impossible challenges, including 15 LEGEND levels that demand true mastery. Switch between 3 ball sizes, unlock game-changing ball modifiers, and chase insane high scores as your reflexes sharpen with every round.

Whether you’re in for a quick blast or a marathon session, the immersive spaceship arenas keep the adrenaline pumping. Reaction training, arcade action, and the joy of Padel — all in one. Smash, score, and become a BLOKZ LEGEND!
